text: Rhymes is an unincorporated community in Richland Parish, Louisiana, United States. The community is located SW. of Rayville, Louisiana. ==Name origin== It is speculated that the name of the community is derived from the local Rhymes plantation that was built during the Antebellum period. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Richland Parish, Louisiana Category:Unincorporated communities in Louisiana
title: Rhymes, Louisiana
